articles.description: We hear the Apple iPhone SE (2022) is right around the corner. Here's everything we want to see on the new compact iPhone.
articles.content: The iPhone SE (2020) was a refreshingly compact phone in a sea of phablet-sized devices. Not only did it make one-handed usage a thing again, but it also brought with it a speedy processor and impres… [+4552 chars]
